Our team

MASTER CHEF

direct and may participate in the preparation

May participate in the preparation, seasoning, and cooking of salads, soups, fish, meats, vegetables, desserts, or other foods. ... May plan and price menu items, order supplies, and keep records and accounts.

Our team

Su-CHEF

the second person in command in a kitchen

Su-chef is a chef who is "the second in command in a kitchen; the person ranking next after the executive chef." Consequently, the sous-chef holds much responsibility in the kitchen, which can eventually lead to promotion to becoming the executive chef.

Our team

Main manager

main business activities

He is tasked with overseeing daily business activities, improving overall business functions, training heads of departments, managing budgets, developing strategic plans, creating policies, and communicating business goals.
